availability.p: This image and transcription is publicly accessible. The image appears courtesy of the repository named in the Source Description. The transcription and annotation were undertaken by Kentucky Historical Society staff, volunteers, and interns. If referencing this document title, accession number, and permanent URL.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition
Early Access

msIdentifier.repository: Kentucky Department for Libraries and Archives
msIdentifier.collection: Office of the Governor, Thomas E. Bramlette: Governor's official correspondence file, petitions for pardons, remissions, and respites 1863-1867

body.p:
State of Kentucky
Harrison County } sct.
Commonwealth of Kentucky
vs
George Sidle

I James F Ware clerk of the Harrison Circuit Court do certify that the following is a list of the Jury empannelled & sworn in the above named case viz. Westly Howard (forman) Jesse B Hickman, James H Debruler, Richd Levi, Robert S Holmes, George Cummings Fleming Cummings, Joshua Smalley, Samuel Blackburn, J B Danson, John Maddox, Moses Florence.
Given under my hand this 16th day of Nov 1863

By compairing the list of Jurors in the case against Sidle with the copy of the poll Books it will be readily seen that some of the jury are rebel sympathizers, that in order to serve they swore to all that was necessary
